Package mdlg

Class MDLG

  • java.lang.Object
    • mdlg.MDLG
  • public class MDLG
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class handling the user-parameters, reading configuration files and calling appropriate maze generation functions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static int height
      The height of the maze (in number of cells) that will be generated
      private static java.lang.String INFO
      The usage string that will be displayed if the program is invoked without parameters or with incorrect parameters
      static java.lang.String VERSION
      The current version of the MDL generator
      private static int width
      The width of the maze (in number of cells) that will be generated

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This is the main method, and it processes the command-line arguments
        Parameters:
        args - The name of the configuration file followed by one or more output file names
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - On input error or error in the syntax of the configuration file.
        See Also:
        Exception

      • printUsage

        private static void printUsage()
        Displays the version information and the list of parameters to be passed to the program at command-line
        Parameters:

      • readConfiguration

        private static java.lang.String readConfiguration​(java.lang.String fileName)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the configuration file passed as the first parameter to the program. The configuration file contains settings that will be common to all generated mazes.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the configuration file
        Returns:
        A string containing a new-line-separated list of configurations
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On input error
        See Also:
        IOException

      • writeMazeToFile

        private static void writeMazeToFile​(boolean[][] maze,
                                    java.lang.String config,
                                    java.lang.String outputFile)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Merges and writes the configuration and generated maze into an output file in MDL format
        Parameters:
        maze - A boolean matrix representing the generated maze, indicating true for path or false for blocked cells
        config - The list of configurations about the maze
        outputFile - The name of the output file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On output error

      • mazeToString

        private static java.lang.String mazeToString​(boolean[][] maze)
        Prepares a generated maze for writing to a file by converting it from boolean to a string in MDL format
        Parameters:
        maze - The generated maze
        Returns:
        A string representation of the maze in MDL format

      • extract

        private static java.lang.String extract​(java.lang.String s,
                                        java.lang.String prefix,
                                        java.lang.String suffix)
        An utility function used to extract a portion of a string with the given prefix and suffix
        Parameters:
        s - The string to process
        prefix - The prefix to match
        suffix - The suffix to match
        Returns:
        The extracted substring with the given prefix and suffix

      • paramsAsInt

        private static int[] paramsAsInt​(java.lang.String s,
                                 java.lang.String sep)
        An utility function separating a delimiter-separated string to separate integer arguments
        Parameters:
        s - The given string
        sep - The delimeter
        Returns:
        An integer array containing each individual element in the given string
